idea-plugin.name: Gradle Properties
idea-plugin.description:
Provides a tool window for managing Gradle properties based on template files.

The plugin reads gradle.properties together with one or more gradle.properties.* template files and presents the properties in a structured, editable table.

Template files can include structured documentation comments to describe each property and mark required values. Changes can be previewed using a unified, read-only diff before being safely merged back into gradle.properties.

This plugin is intended to simplify configuration management for projects that rely on documented Gradle property templates.
